solution_line_template: Eighteen hours later, after departing from London, Chance arrived in New York at {departure_time_ny}:00+{flight_duration_london_ny} hours = {arrival_time_ny}:00 on Tuesday.
If he arrived in cape town at {arrival_time_cape_town}:00 p.m. on Tuesday, his flight took {arrival_time_cape_town}:00-{arrival_time_ny}:00 = {flight_duration_ny_cape_town} hours.
